name: Overcharged Main Levels
description: A revamp of the UI for the official main levels menu!

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether or not the mod should change the Main Levels menu.

overcharge-menu.name: Overcharge Menu
overcharge-menu.description: If the mod should revamp the look for the Main Levels menu. Turning this off won't disable features such as level preview or page icons.

level-preview.name: Show Level Preview
level-preview.description: If the mod should show a preview of the level. Turn this off if you are experiencing lag.

page-icons.name: Show Difficulty Icons
page-icons.description: If the mod should replace the dots with difficulty faces for the page icons, and should make them clickable.
